forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 18C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 66F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers likely. High near 50F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 44F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 44F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
